value.title: Exploring the Power BI Model View
value.excerpt: Have you really used the Power BI model view? Patrick walks through some of things he loves about it. Both some old favorites and some newer items you may not be aware of.  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level?

value.title: Fiddler (Web Tracing)
value.excerpt: I take a look at how to get up and running with Fiddler.  This will lead into next week's video regarding using Fiddler with Power BI.  I wanted to have a good starting point for folks that have never used it before.  Fiddler:  http://telerik.com/fiddler  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how you can find Power BI users that have signed in within your organization. value.title: Fuzzy match / merging in Power BI Desktop (October 2018)

value.title: Row-Level Security in Power BI - Revisited
value.excerpt: We had some recent changes to Row-level security in Power BI. Row-level security (RLS) was moved to be configured in Power BI Desktop with the June 2016 release.
